meanings.definition: A practical joke or mischievous act.
meanings.sent1: The children giggled after pulling off one of their silly pranks.
meanings.sent2: She fell for his prank and laughed along with everyone else.
meanings.sent3: The prank they played on their teacher was harmless and brought smiles.
meanings.sent4: His pranks were like colorful fireworks, lighting up the room with laughter.
meanings.sent5: The memory of that prank stayed with them, a funny tale to tell.

meanings.definition: To play a trick or practical joke on someone.
meanings.sent1: He pranks his friends by hiding their belongings as a joke.
meanings.sent2: They decided to prank their colleague by filling his office with balloons.
meanings.sent3: She pranks her siblings by pretending to be a ghost in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Pranking his classmates was his way of spreading joy and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous cat pranks the dog by stealing its toys playfully.
